CustomField.description: Controls whether all Ledger Entries are grouped by GAU. Requires an Accounting Subledger Growth Edition license.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: All Debit and Credit Ledger Entries will be associated with a GAU. Secondary Payment Ledger Entries will also be created, balancing each Payment Ledger Entry. Requires an Accounting Subledger Growth Edition license.
CustomField.label: Group All Debits And Credits By GAU
